video.title: Episode 1 - A Devil on my Desk
video.description:
THE GRAND INQUISITOR

Episode 1 - Originally Aired 11.11.07

Now streaming on http://newsdate2011.com

Weekly Web Mini-Series Premieres November 11th
Original Score by DJ Spooky Screenplay by Ruth Margraff Multi Image Design by Julie Talen Directed by Tony Torn

comment.text:
Look it up for your self its real no lies. Wake up people if you ever get sick or have a Doctor bill ask your self why...

Its because you are a Slave to Great Britten and the British law.. You Work for the Queen of England your butt is owned by the Queen of England. That's why England has free health care and American's don't... Americans and die for British oil but you can't get free health care... you peace of property worthless. Pay that insurance! get it cut off pay more money! Bills Bills to the Queen pay the Queen her money!

You pay for England to have free health care your a slave to their laws and on the stock market look up how much your worth to the QUEEN.

Next time you get a doctors bill ask your self why... * Why Am I a SLAVE!...* Wake up you peace of British property!

Look up my video here or on you tube same name... *

So until next time your magic "American" druid cannabis smoking magician says... Puff, puff!
